title: Handle Inbound Customs Clearance
description: An international shipment from a supplier is being held by customs. An agent must provide the necessary documentation to clear it.

tasks.description: Receive a notification from the customs broker that a shipment is on hold.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent is alerted to the customs hold.

tasks.description: Retrieve the commercial invoice, packing list, and bill of lading for the shipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all the required shipping documents.

tasks.description: Submit the required documentation to the customs broker.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends the documents to the broker.
